issue.title: [CF 10] Not showing
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.66, Microsoft Windows NT 6.0.6002 Service Pack 2

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 1.2.3

Description

When ive configurated all my attack and spells, and by all i mean 3 bars, and press lock addon the addon dissapears from my screen. Ive tried to click on/off everything, restarting the game, changing spec but nothing helps :( Basicly, it only shows when i open up config.

Installed Addons

Bartender4 - 4.4.2 Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.44-r3851 GearScore - GearScore 3.1.14 - Release Grid - 1.30300.1265 GridStatusRaidIcons - 30300-1 GridStatusRole - 1.1.5 GridStatusThreat - 30300-2 OneBag3 - v3.3.11 Paladin Beacon of Light, Sacred Shield Tracker - v.2.3.03.006 PallyPower - v3.2.11 Postal - v3.3.1 QuestHelper - 1.3.11 Recount - v3.3g release SexyMap - v1.2.3 Shadowed Unit Frames - v3.2.6 TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 1.2.3 UnderAchiever - Automatic Fake Achievement Links! - UnderAchiever_v3.3.2


> Posted by CurseForge user orkan84 | Imported from CurseForge issue #10 | Raw
